description: Trim whitespace or other characters from the right return the result. The mask text can be any string of text.
name: right_trim

description: Trim whitespace or other characters from both sides and return the result. The mask text can be any string of text.
name: trim

description: Perform a regular expression search and replace on the target text.
name: regex_replace

description: Replace a text phrase with another. Search can be any word in the value and the replacement can be anything.
name: replace

description: Formats text with variable substitution. %s is used to replace text.
name: format_string

description: Returns whether or not the expression is present at the end. The search term can be any string of text. This transformation returns a 'true' or 'false' response.
name: ends_width

description: Returns the number of characters of a string.
name: string_length

description: Returns whether or not the expression is found and is case-sensitive. The search term can be any string of text. This returns a 'true' or 'false' response.
name: contains

description: Concatenates target value with value together by an optional separator. The value can be any text and the separator can be anything: + , -, _, a space, etc...
name: concat

description: Converts the first letter of each word to a capital letter
name: capitalize

description: Returns whether or not the case-insensitive expression is found. The search term can be any string of text.This returns a 'true' or 'false' response.
name: ci_contains

description: Returns the index of the case-sensitive expression or false if it can't be found.  The search term can be any string of text.returns an integer value of where the character(s) exist in the string.
name: index

description: Returns the index of the case-insensitive expression or false if it can't be found. The search term can be any string of text.Returns an integer value of where the character(s) exist in the string.
name: ci_index

description: Returns whether or not the case-insensitive expression is present at the end. The search term can be any text string. This returns a 'true' or 'false' answer.
name: ci_ends_width

description: Returns whether or not the case-insensitive expression is present at the beginning. The search term can be any string of text.This returns a 'true' or 'false' response.
name: ci_starts_with

description: Returns whether or not the expression is present at the beginning.  The search term can be any string of text and is case-sensitive.This returns a 'true' or 'false' response.
name: starts_with

description: Extracts a sub-string of text. the start index character is included but the end index character is not
groovyTemplate: {target -> if (end == 'null') return target.substring(#{start}); else return target.substring(#{start}, #{end})}(#{target})

description: Converts all characters to lower case and returns the result
name: to_lower

description: Converts all characters to upper case and returns the result
name: to_upper

description: Trim whitespace or other characters from the left side and return the result. The mask text can be any string of text.
name: left_trim

description: Returns the absolute value. The absolute value of the number is the positive equivalent.
name: abs

description: Calculates the arc cosine of the given value in radians
name: acos

description: Convert radians to degrees
name: radToDegree

description: Modulus 2 values together and return the result, The modulus is the remainder after dividing one number by another.
name: modulo

description: Multiplies 2 values together and returns the result.
name: multiply

description: Round fractions down to their integer equivalent.
name: floor

description: Convert the given value from degrees  to radians
name: degToRad

description: Calculates the cosine of the given value in radians
name: cos

description: Round fractions up to their integer equivalent.
name: ciel

description: Calculates the inverse hyperbolic tangent of the given value in radians.
name: atanh

description: Calculates the arc tangent of the given value in radians.
name: atan

description: Calculates the inverse hyperbolic sine of the given value in radians.
name: asinh

description: Calculates the arc sine of the given value in radians.
name: asin

description: Returns the target value raised to the power of the exponent.
name: pow

description: Divides 2 values together and returns the result.
name: divide

description: Adds 2 values together and returns the result.
name: add

description: Calculates the inverse hyperbolic cosine of the supplied value in radians.
name: acosh

description: Subtract days from the given date.
name: minus_days

description: Add days to the given date.
name: plus_days

description: Add months to the given date.
name: plus_months

description: Subtract months from the given date.
name: subtract_months

description: Add years to the given date.
name: plus_years

description: Subtract years from the given date.
name: subtract_years

description: Get the month of the year
name: get_month

description: Get day of the month
name: get_day

description: Format the given date according to the given format pattern
name: date_format
